name: IrisPlus
description:
Introduction to the game

IRIS+ tells the story of griffin commander leading teenage girls to become "" idols" "after his retirement.

The smoke cleared, and all was not over.

Their stories continue to flow --

IRIS - this is the dream and love song of teen girls.

[game features]

Multiple choice of plot will lead to multiple endings.

The role is highly reductive, feeling the distinctive side of the tactical human figure;

Who is your favorite "she"?

The young girls were singing on the stage.

[when you playing]

Players as "a veteran", through and different "girls" get to know, towards different endings

Every choice you make in the game is crucial. Choose carefully
